flags.name: --zero-intercept-ratio
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 and less than 1 (example: 0.3).

flags.name: --adjustment-min
flags.validation: If adjustment-max is also provided, adjustment-max must be greater than or equal to adjustment-min.

flags.name: --adjustment-max
flags.validation: If adjustment-min is also provided, adjustment-max must be greater than or equal to adjustment-min.

flags.description: Prevent rating when index value is missing.
flags.name: --prevent-rating-when-index-value-missing

permissions: Requires authorization via RateAdjustmentPolicy, which delegates access to the associated rate (RatePolicy).
side_effects: Updates rate adjustment attributes and/or cost index relationship.
validation_notes: Requires a rate adjustment ID argument and at least one field to update. zero-intercept-ratio must be greater than 0 and less than 1 when provided. If both adjustment-min and adjustment-max are provided, adjustment-max must be greater than or equal to adjustment-min. cost-index must remain unique per rate. If a parent rate adjustment is set, it must use the same cost index.
